titleStmt.title: The manner of the cruell outragious murther of William Storre Mast. of Art, minister, and preacher at Market Raisin in the county of Lincolne committed by Francis Cartwright one of his parishioners, the 30. day of August anno. 1602.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
